item.description:
We will be going to

http://www.mohegansun...

www.mohegansun.com/

If Elaine is still coming, then I will pick her
Up between 2:30 to 2:45 at Barnes &
Nobel in Milford.

Maribeth has my cell number.

We will stop on the way to buy more
Coffee either at Starbucks or
New Haven TA Travel Center
I-95 Exit 56
Branford , CT 06405
203-481-0301
We should be at this location between 3:00 to
3:15. The above time is for the Branford location.
This is the second meeting on the way location.

http://www.aitaonline....

www.aitaonline.com/TS/CT.html

Hope to arrive at the Casino by between
4:00 to 4:30.

I am going mostly for the Mall and
Food Courts.
Some are going to gamble.

We only plan on being there for two to
Two and a Half Hours.

We might go to the other Casinos in the area later
In the Year if this goes well.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably car pool first. .
item.why: Who wants great food, shopping and some gambling?
item.name: Coffee Talk has a Cup at a Local Casino 6/29
